Description: Reverend Kyle Shutt - 3-Tone Burst Condition: This Kyle Shutt signature is in great shape. Serial number: 28570 Weight: 7.73 lbs The Kyle Shutt Signature guitar features a sealed semi-hollow korina body with an asymmetrical center block that allows you to easily switch between clean and high-volume rock. It's stacked with distinctly-voiced Kyle Shutt signature Railhammer pickups, and features the first 4-knob control layout, delivering a broad range of tonal possibilities. It also has a 3-piece korina set neck with a comfortable medium oval profile and a 12" radius.  Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Sealed Semi-Hollow Korina, Solid Maple Top Body Color/Finish: 3-Tone Burst/Gloss Neck Wood: 3-Piece Korina Neck Profile: Medium Oval  Neck Radius: 12" Neck Joint: Set Neck Fingerboard: Rosewood Fingerboard Inlays: Slanted Block Frets: 22 Medium Jumbo Nut: Boneite Nut Width: 43mm Tuners: Reverend Pin-Lock Scale Length: 24-3/4" Bridge: Tune-O-Matic with Stoptail Pickups: Kyle Shutt Signature  Controls: Bridge Volume, Neck Volume, Tone, Bass Contour, 3-Way Jack Location: Side Hardware Finish: Chrome Case: Not Included Country Of Origin: South Korea Switching: 3-Way Pickup Selector: P1 - Bridge Pickup P2 - Bridge & Neck Pickup P3 - Neck Pickup
